instruction.value: Instill into conjuctiva of LEFT eye at 5 minute intervals up to 3 drops as required to produce mydriasis.
Instill into conjuctiva of RIGHT eye at 5 minute intervals up to 3 drops as required to product mydriasis.
Instill into conjuctiva of affected eye(s) at 5 minute intervals up to 3 drops per eye as required to product mydriasis.
